title: Riot Squad Singed
body:
Any chance that there could be a return of riot squad singed? After seeing Championship riven being re-released as a kind of reworked version, what are the chances of Riot Singed returning also? Would love to know on behalf of my fellow singed mains who are dying to get this skin! Interested to hear from a riot member also :) Have been playing League of legends for 5 years and is the only skin i've ever wanted... 

Thanks for your time! {{champion:27}}     {{summoner:6}}

replies.body: Per the[ legacy skins](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944-Guide-to-Legacy-and-Limited-Skins#h1q5) guide, it looks like Riot Squad Singed is a limited skin.  It won't be available at a later date or through the store, currently.  :(  There are a lot of awesome limited skins, but it's not my call on changing its availability.  Your best bet is to let your voice be heard by asking on[ Ask Riot](https://ask.leagueoflegends.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) directly.  Good luck with your campaign on this!
